tool.name: SAGA.shapes_lines.9
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayLINES_A False isArrayLINES_B False output_data_CROSSINGS $output_data_CROSSINGS name SAGA.shapes_lines.9 LINES_A $LINES_A LINES_B $LINES_B ATTRIBUTES $ATTRIBUTES prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CROSSINGS $OutputSection_CROSSINGS.outputType_CROSSINGS transmissionMode_CROSSINGS $OutputSection_CROSSINGS.transmissionMode_CROSSINGS

param.name: LINES_A
param.label: 1st Lines Layer
param.help: 1st Lines Layer The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: LINES_B
param.label: 2nd Lines Layer
param.help: 2nd Lines Layer The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: ATTRIBUTES
param.label: Parent Attributes
param.help: attributes inherited by parent lines layers

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CROSSINGS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CROSSINGS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
